name: Puppy Shooter
description:
Puppy Shooter is a brand new bubble shooting game with cute puppies.
Help Johnny solve problems in adventure by shooting the colorful bubbles.
Rescue trapped bees and frogs and fight evil spiders
Are you ready to start this adventure?

Game features:
* The new pet system, powerful pets accompany you through the storm!
*Every puppy has different skills!
* Super rich novice benefits!
* Over 400 exciting bubble levels!
* Five different bubble game modes will bring you a rich gaming experience!
* Gorgeous special effects, interesting skills!
* Easy and addictive
